entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. Rain showers beginning this evening then changing to 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind becoming northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 late this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
